titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend certain expiring provisions of law administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2018

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Arrington moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 3479.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
